name: Yernazar
review: I am a pilot in local air transportation companies and I had a goal for a long time to improve my English skills and transition my career toward flying international flights. With Arailym’s help I started learning General English in Brighton, UK and visibly improved my skills in 3 months.

name: Aigerim
review: I have completed my undergraduate degree in Chemical Engineering and wanted to work for international companies and apply for jobs globally. I needed to improve my speaking and writing. I enrolled to language school in Leeds, UK for 8 weeks. By the end of the course I got Level C2 from my initial B2.

name: Igor
review: When I realised that my initial two-month program wouldn’t be enough, Arailym went the extra mile to assist me in extending my stay for an additional four months. Currently, I’m staying in Wales, preparing to apply for a Master’s degree at a local university.
